alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 9:21AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Nancy Creek at West Wesley Road at Atlanta affecting Fulton County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nancy Creek at West Wesley Road at Atlanta. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of residential yards occurs along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on West Wesley Road. This includes Nancy Creek Road and Ridge Valley Court. Portions of The Westminster Schools athletic fields upstream from the gage will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
